QuestionStem: How do you think the displays by the males in the photos relate to qualities that encourage females to choose them as mates? Select the display and then select the quality.
CorrectFeedback: The large antlers of the elk provide protection for females and offspring in the territory he defends. Elaborate body part displays are a sign of a healthy male with good genes to pass on to offspring. Males that offer gifts of food or materials for nests might be chosen as a mate.
PartiallyCorrectFeedback: Relate the quality of the male to something that might be advantageous for the female.
IncorrectFeedback: Relate the quality of the male to something that might be advantageous for the female.
FinalIncorrectFeedback: The large antlers of the elk provide protection for females and offspring in the territory he defends. Elaborate body part displays are a sign of a healthy male with good genes to pass on to offspring. Males that offer gifts of food or materials for nests might be chosen as a mate.
